description: Job Summary:  The Director of Contract Logistics Business Development will be responsible for identifying and overseeing all of KOGEO’s new business opportunities in the North American Region. KOGEOS, target clientele are those within the Food and Beverage industry, including alcohol. The goal for the Director of Contract Logistics Business Development is to cultivate strong business relationships while increasing revenue and profitability. This position requires strong leadership skills, excellent communication skills, vigorous negotiation skills, an understanding of logistics processes and a strategic mindset.Salary:  100k---130kLocation: Hybrid remote and in office days in Riverside, CA  Scheduled--- Monday to FridayHours:  8:30am to 5pm  Responsibilities:  Building and maintaining relationships with prospects, vendors, and other internal partners to negotiate favorable terms and ensure growth targets are met.Identify areas of Business sales improvement by analyzing and monitoring key performance indicators
